title: TalkBridge
technology: React Router for making it a single page application
Tailwind CSS and Daisy UI for design
features: TalkBridge is an innovative communication platform designed to bridge the gap between diverse languages and cultures.
A normal user cannot more than 5 posts.If user want to more than 5 posts, he has to become a membership by making payment
User can upVote or downVote, comment and share any post
Users can log in or register using Google, or email/password for easy and secure access.
Admin can control the total system
description: TalkBridge is an innovative communication platform designed to bridge the gap between diverse languages and cultures. Utilizing advanced natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning technologies, TalkBridge provides seamless translation and transcription services to facilitate real-time, effective communication across different languages.

title: StudyBuddy
technology: React Router for making it a single page application
Tailwind CSS and Daisy UI for design
features: StudyBuddy is a smart study management application designed to help students organize their study materials, schedule study sessions, and collaborate with peers effectively.
Users can log in or register using Google, GitHub, or email/password for easy and secure access.
All assignment submitted by user will remain here in pending form until the examiner marks them.
An user can update and submit all assignments.But a user can't delete other assinment except his own.
An user can see all this submitted assignments on My Assignment page.
description: StudyBuddy is a smart study management application designed to help students organize their study materials, schedule study sessions, and collaborate with peers effectively. With StudyBuddy, students can streamline their study process, stay on track with their learning goals, and boost their academic performance.

title: ArtGallery
technology: React Router for making it a single page application
Tailwind CSS and Daisy UI for design
features: Frist this site will have Home Page. There will be banner section,Art And Craft,Gallery section,Team section.
Users can sign up and log in to this website using google account and email
Anyone canâ€™t go to some pages without login, which is developed by React Router.
Users can add items, see their items list and also delete their items.
description: ArtGallery is your virtual destination for exploring, appreciating, and purchasing fine art from around the world. Our platform brings the beauty of art to your fingertips, allowing you to experience gallery visits from the comfort of your home.
